703634f-a.title: Brooklyn: Clermont Avenue - Lafayette Avenue
703634f-a.text:
Clermont Ave., east side, south from Lafayette St.,
tewards Greene Ave. The view shows the upper half of the tower
of the Epiacepal Church of the Messiah.
August 2, 1927.
P.L.Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTION.
703634f-a.folder: Clermont Avenue & Lafayette Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

703633f-a.title: Brooklyn: Clermont Avenue - Lafayette Avenue
703633f-a.text:
317 Clermont Ave., at the N.E. corner of Lafayette Ave., showing the
Masonic Temple.
August 2, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
703633f-a.folder: Clermont Avenue & Lafayette Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

703632f-a.title: Brooklyn: Clermont Avenue - Lafayette Avenue
703632f-a.text:
Clermont Avenue, south from Ladayette Avenue, showing St. Johns
Roman Catholic Cahpel (white buildding) and the Church of the
Messiah (Cove-shanec Steeple).
P. L. Sperr  June 21, 1941
NO REPRODUCTIONS
703632f-a.folder: Clermont Avenue & Lafayette Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

705347f-a.title: Brooklyn: Lafayette Avenue - Clermont Avenue
705347f-a.text:
Lafayette Ave., at the N.E. corner of Clermont Ave. A view of
Vernon Bros. Town House, now occupied by the Masonic Temple.
1920.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
705347f-a.folder: Lafayette Avenue & Clermont Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

705348f-a.title: Brooklyn: Lafayette Avenue - Clermont Avenue
705348f-a.text:
Lafayette Avenue, at the northwest corner of 9lermont Avenue.
P. L. Sperr  September 19, 1941
NO REPPODUCTIONS
705348f-a.folder: Lafayette Avenue & Clermont Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
